## DialogComponent class

Bootstrap modal dialog component

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DialogComponent implements OnInit, AfterViewInit, OnDestroy 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(platformId)](./bootstrap-core.dialogcomponent._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>DialogComponent</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [backdrop](./bootstrap-core.dialogcomponent.backdrop.md) |  | <code>boolean &#124; &quot;static&quot;</code> | Bootstrap modal dialog backdrop property wrapper. If true, then includes a modal-backdrop element. Alternatively, specify 'static' for a backdrop which doesn't close the modal on click. |
|  [backgroundFocus](./bootstrap-core.dialogcomponent.backgroundfocus.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Indication that elements in background can be focused |
|  [dialogCss](./bootstrap-core.dialogcomponent.dialogcss.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Modal dialog extra css classes |
|  [dialogId](./bootstrap-core.dialogcomponent.dialogid.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Id of dialog |
|  [dialogTitle](./bootstrap-core.dialogcomponent.dialogtitle.md) |  | <code>string</code> | Title of displayed dialog |
|  [keyboard](./bootstrap-core.dialogcomponent.keyboard.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Bootstrap modal dialog keyboard property wrapper. If true, closes the modal when escape key is pressed. |
|  [visible](./bootstrap-core.dialogcomponent.visible.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Gets or sets indication whether is dialog visible |
|  [visibleChange](./bootstrap-core.dialogcomponent.visiblechange.md) |  | <code>EventEmitter&lt;boolean&gt;</code> | Occurs when visiblity of dialog changes |
